review: As good as other TV services, includes Downton Abbey
author: Lawrence Lane "santanawolf"

review: Very easy to use.  Basically just plugged it in and it worked.
author: Louise Marshburn

review: I feel like I never have to have regular cable ever again. I love this.
author: Amanda Ruiz

review: Never worked. I got a replacement and still could not maneuver curser. I called the help desk no help. I did get someone from the Middle east that said that my home computer was the problem and he could repair it for $250.00 Hang Up.I have great news to report "It is working" Amazon reformatted the installation and initialization process. New software downloads were added. I will give it 4 star just because it is working.
author: Gregory L Allen

review: I love my fire stick! I bought this item on prime day for a discounted price and I am very satisfied! I love that my Kindle syncs up with the fire stick. I am able to watch shows and movies from prime instant video on my TV instead of watching them on the small screen of my Kindle. It is very user friendly and easy to navigate.
author: DD
